title: Getting started
text:
Usage
tidepredictor can be used either as a command line tool or as a Python library.

Command line
$ tidepredictor -x 15.0 -y 58.0 -s "2024-01-01" -e "2024-01-01 06:00:00" -i 30
 time,level
2024-01-01 00:00:00,-0.23005383929341
2024-01-01 00:30:00,-0.25469254130407887
2024-01-01 01:00:00,-0.25508701731158095
2024-01-01 01:30:00,-0.23188505378869703
2024-01-01 02:00:00,-0.18749975913996147
2024-01-01 02:30:00,-0.12583296056206333
2024-01-01 03:00:00,-0.051895458442239854
2024-01-01 03:30:00,0.028622562288443416
2024-01-01 04:00:00,0.10978032932536673
2024-01-01 04:30:00,0.18577536127300007
2024-01-01 05:00:00,0.2512700237380429
2024-01-01 05:30:00,0.30165067160350273
2024-01-01 06:00:00,0.3332277132542259


Python library

from pathlib import Path

DATA_DIR = Path("~/.local/share/tidepredictor")
path = (DATA_DIR / "elevation.nc").expanduser()
path

PosixPath('/home/runner/.local/share/tidepredictor/elevation.nc')



from datetime import datetime
from tidepredictor import UtideAdapter, PredictionType

predictor = UtideAdapter(consituents=path, type=PredictionType.level)

predictor

/home/runner/work/tidepredictor/tidepredictor/.venv/lib/python3.11/site-packages/utide/harmonics.py:16: RuntimeWarning:

invalid value encountered in cast

/home/runner/work/tidepredictor/tidepredictor/.venv/lib/python3.11/site-packages/utide/harmonics.py:17: RuntimeWarning:

invalid value encountered in cast



UtideAdapter(consituents=/home/runner/.local/share/tidepredictor/elevation.nc, type=PredictionType.level)



df = predictor.predict(
    lon=0.0,
    lat=0.0,
    start=datetime(2021, 1, 1),
    end=datetime(2021, 1, 2),
)
df.head()


shape: (5, 2)

title: utide
text:
utide
Utide adapter module.





Name
Description




UtideAdapter
Adapter for the utide tide predictor engine.





utide.UtideAdapter(self, consituents, type)
Adapter for the utide tide predictor engine.











Name
Type
Description
Default




consituents
Path
Path to the constituents file to use for the prediction.
required


type
PredictionType
The type of prediction to make.
required









Name
Description




predict
Predict tide levels or currents using utide.





utide.UtideAdapter.predict(lon, lat, start, end, interval=timedelta(hours=1))
Predict tide levels or currents using utide.
